Subject: A plot point that's driving me crazy!

I hope someone on this list has the answer to the question that's been 
making me crazy and has brought the "great Bakumatsu/Meiji time travel" 
to a dead halt.

There is a superstition that if you sleep in a room with an uncovered 
mirror that a female demon will come and steal your soul/take you away 
to the underworld.

What I need to find is this demon's fatal weakness you know like

Vampires=crosses/garlic/sunglight

Werewolves= silver bullets

Superman= kryptonite

What could the mirror demon's "instant death thing" be? And it _can't_ 
involve breaking the mirror.

-- 
Barbara Sheridan	

http://www.barbarasheridan.net
